rukus.text: Proklam O My servants exceeded lim neniam despair de di mercy! Por DI forgives all pek! Li est Forgiver Merciful
Vi obe your Lord submit Him totally retribution overtakes vi; tiam vi ne help
Sekv put path ke pint vi your Lord retribution overtakes vi suddenly when vi malpli expect gxi
Lest anim dir Kiel sorry mi est disregarding di commandments; mi est certainly 1 de mockers
Dir Hav DI direkt me mi est kun des righteous
Aux dir when gxi seg retribution mi get another sxanc mi work righteousness
jes ja (vi did get suficx sxanc)! My proofs ven vi vi rejected them torn arrogant igx disbeliever
Tag Resurrection vi seg vizagx de those who lied DI kovr kun mizer. est Infer ne dekstr retribution por arrogant unu
DI testament sav those argument righteousness; Li rekompenc them. Ne harm tusx them nor vol ili hav any grief
DI est Creator all AJX LI est en PLEN control all AJX
Al Him aparten all decisions heavens ter those disbelieve di revelations est efektiv losers
